snippet.title: CBSE Class 10 | English Grammar | Subject Verb Concord - Kinds and Rules |
snippet.description:
In this lesson, you learn about, Subject Verb Concord - Kinds and Rules, Subject – Verb Agreement
“Why care for grammar as long as we are good?”
Artemus Ward
Grammar and Punctuation
Subject
Verb
agreement
The subject verb agreement specifies that the subject and verb must agree in number.
The subject and verb must be either singular or plural.
Singular
Plural
The student paints
Your children paint
Types of Concord
Grammatical Concord
Notional Concord
Proximity
The verb must match its subject both in person and number
Remember
Singular subjects take singular verbs and plural subjects take plural verbs.
Examples
Each boy has his own chair
Two girls were dancing on the stage.
The verb can sometimes agree with the subject according to the notion of number rather than to the actual presence of the grammatical marker of that notion.
Notional concord in simple terms means agreement in meaning.
The management have asked the college to decide by a vote.
The verb should agree with the closer of the two subjects.
Modal verbs can be used in the sentences.
Either you or I am responsible for cleaning the house.
Rule 1
Use the singular form of the verb, when the subject has a singular form and a singular meaning.
He sees that it is better to live in peace.
You can use the singular form of a verb, when the subject is a collective noun and represents a number of persons or things taken as one unit.
The audience is requested to take the back gate to exit.
use the singular form of the verb when the subject consists of two or more singular nouns connected by or or nor
Raju or Ramu is arriving by train today.
Use the singular form of the verb when the subject is in plural form, but represents a number of things to be taken together as forming one unit.
Two thirds of the land is Raju’s.
The singular form is also used with book titles, other names, and singulars of plural form.
Politics is the only field now open for me.
Click on the correct verb from the words given in the brackets to fill in the blanks. Click on ' Show Answer ' to view the answers.
A black cat --- (bring, brings) bad luck, according to an old superstition.
young children often --- (protest, protests ) when bedtime --- (roll, rolls) around.
A black cat brings bad luck, according to an old superstition.
young children often  protest when bedtime rolls around.
My thoughts often become confused when I sit down to write an essay.
A person needs to set goals if he or she wants to succeed.
My thoughts often --- (become, becomes) confused when I sit down to write an essay.
A person ----- (need, needs ) to set goals if he or she wants to succeed.
The food containers --- (is, are ) stacked in the lower cabinet.
My brother ---- (work, works ) at the Apollo Hospital as a physical therapist.
The food containers are stacked in the lower cabinet.
My brother works  at the Apollo Hospital as a physical therapist.
The price or warranty --- ( is, are) not as important as other factors.
Neither Ben nor Pete --- (want, wants ) to make a rush decision about the computer.
The price or warranty  are not as important as other factors.
Neither Ben nor Pete wants  to make a rush decision about the computer.
Neither the directions on the package nor the brochure --- (explain, explains ) how to play the game.
The Wings of fire --- (is, are ) an autobiography of A. P. Abdul kalam.
Neither the directions on the package nor the brochure explains how to play the game.
The Wings of fire is an autobiography of A. P. Abdul kalam.
The Birds' --- (is, are) one of Alfred Hitchcock's most well – known thrillers.
The team --- (plays, play) well after a good night's sleep. (team refers to the whole group)
The Birds' is one of Alfred Hitchcock's most well – known thrillers.
The team plays well after a good night's sleep. (team refers to the whole group)
Two teaspoons of sugar --- ( was, were) all that the cake recipe called for.
Statistics --- ( is, are) not being offered this semester.
Two teaspoons of sugar  was all that the cake recipe called for.
Statistics is not being offered this semester.
Measles --- ( is, are) a contagious disease
Measles is a contagious disease.
Good Job
